series_title: Insurance Company Tax and Assessment Records
series_description: This series documents taxes paid by insurance companies. This series may include, but is not limited to: premiums collected, taxes paid, audits, and assessments.
retention_statement: 7 Years after end of calendar year

series_description: This series documents that requested insurance was not available or not available at an acceptable price from any company licensed to do business in the Commonwealth. This series may include, but is not limited to: affidavits
retention_statement: 5 Years after end of calendar year

series_description: This series documents taxes assessed to surplus brokers. series may include, but is not limited to: premiums collected, taxes paids, audits, and assessments
retention_statement: 7 Years after end of calendar year
